   30: %% 1222           0 :         } else if (lastput == 0) { /* A multibyte UTF8 character */
   31: %% 1223           0 :             for (i = 0; i < ubytes; ++i) {
   32: %% 1224           0 :                 outc(ubuf[i]);
   33: %% 1225             :             }
   34: %% 1226             :         } else {
   35: %% 1227           0 :             outc(lastput);
   36: %%  - $TERM set to > 1024 long value

   79: -record(tmux, {peer, node, name, ssh_server_name, orig_location }).
   80: suite() ->
   81:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   82:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   83: 
   84: all() ->
   85:     [{group, to_erl},
   86:      {group, tty},
   87:      {group, ssh}].
   88: 
   89: groups() ->
   90:     [{to_erl,[],
   91:       [get_columns_and_rows_escript,get_columns_and_rows,
   92:        exit_initial, job_control_local,
   93:        job_control_remote, job_control_remote_noshell,
   94:        ctrl_keys, stop_during_init, wrap,

  100:      {shell_history, [],

  175: 
  176: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  177:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
  178:     os:putenv("TERM", "vt100"),
  179:     [{term,Term}|Config].
  180: 
  181: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  182:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  183:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: init_per_group(to_erl, Config) ->
  187:     case rtnode:get_progs() of
  188:         {error, Error} ->
  189:             {skip, Error};
  190:         _ ->
  191:             DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
  192:             [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config]
  193:     end;
  194: init_per_group(remsh, Config) ->
  195:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  196:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  197:         new -> Config
  198:     end;
  199: init_per_group(shell_history, Config) ->
  200:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  201:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  202:         new -> Config
  203:     end;
  204: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty; Group =:= ssh ->
  205:     case string:split(tmux("-V")," ") of
  206:         ["tmux",[Num,$.|_]] when Num >= $3, Num =< $9 ->
  207:             tmux("kill-session"),
  208:             "" = tmux("-u new-session -x 50 -y 60 -d"),
  209:             ["" = tmux(["set-environment '",Name,"' '",Value,"'"])
  210:              || {Name,Value} <- os:env()],
  211:             Config;
  212:         ["tmux", Vsn] ->
  213:             {skip, "invalid tmux version " ++ Vsn ++ ". Need vsn 3 or later"};
  214:         Error ->
  215:             {skip, "tmux not installed " ++ Error}
  216:     end;
  217: 
  218: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty_unicode;
  219:                                    Group =:= tty_latin1;
  220:                                    Group =:= ssh_unicode;
  221:                                    Group =:= ssh_latin1 ->
  222:     [Lang,_] =
  223:         string:split(
  224:           os:getenv("LC_ALL",
  225:                     os:getenv("LC_CTYPE",
  226:                               os:getenv("LANG","en_US.UTF-8"))),"."),
  227:     case Group of
  228:         tty_unicode ->
  229:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  230:         tty_latin1 ->
  231:             % [{encoding, latin1},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".ISO-8859-1"}]}|Config],
  232:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"};
  233:         ssh_unicode ->
  234:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  235:         ssh_latin1 ->
  236:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"}
  237:     end;
  238: init_per_group(sh_custom, Config) ->
  239:     %% Ensure that ERL_AFLAGS will not override the value of the shell_history variable.
  240:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-noshell","-kernel","shell_history","not_overridden"]),
  241:     try erpc:call(Node, application, get_env, [kernel, shell_history], rtnode:timeout(normal)) of
  242:         {ok, not_overridden} ->
  243:             Config;
  244:         _ ->
  245:             SkipText = "shell_history variable is overridden (probably by ERL_AFLAGS)",
  246:             {skip, SkipText}
  247:     catch
  248:         C:R:Stk ->
  249:             io:format("~p\n~p\n~p\n", [C,R,Stk]),
  250:             {skip, "Unexpected error"}
  251:     after
  252:         peer:stop(Peer)
  253:     end;
  254: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  255:     Config.
  256: 
  257: end_per_group(Group, _Config) when Group =:= tty; Group =:= ssh ->
  258:     Windows = string:split(tmux("list-windows"), "\n", all),
  259:     lists:foreach(
  260:       fun(W) ->
  261:               case string:split(W, " ", all) of
  262:                   ["0:" | _] -> ok;
  263:                   [No, _Name | _] ->
  264:                       "" = os:cmd(["tmux select-window -t ", string:split(No,":")]),
  265:                       ct:log("~ts~n~ts",[W, os:cmd(lists:concat(["tmux capture-pane -p -e"]))])
  266:               end
  267:       end, Windows),
  268: %    "" = os:cmd("tmux kill-session")
  269:     ok;
  270: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  271:     Config.
  272: 
  273: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
  274:     Path = [Func,
  275:             [proplists:get_value(name,P) ||
  276:                 P <- [proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[])] ++
  277:                     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])]],
  278:     [{tc_path, lists:concat(lists:join("-",lists:flatten(Path)))} | Config].
  279: 
  280: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  281:     GroupProperties = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  282:     case (GroupProperties =/= false) andalso proplists:get_value(parallel, GroupProperties, false) of
  283:         true -> ok;
  284:         false ->
  285:             %% Terminate any connected nodes. They may disturb test cases that follow.
  286:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  287:                                   catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, [])
  288:                           end, nodes()),
  289:             ok
  290:     end.
  291: 
  292: %%-define(DEBUG,1).
  293: -ifdef(DEBUG).
  294: -define(dbg(Data),ct:pal("~p",[Data])).
  295: -else.
  296: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
  297: -endif.
  298: 
  299: string_to_term(Str) ->
  300:     try
  301:         {ok,Tokens,_EndLine} = erl_scan:string(Str ++ "."),
  302:         {ok,AbsForm} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  303:         {value,Value,_Bs} = erl_eval:exprs(AbsForm, erl_eval:new_bindings()),
  304:         Value
  305:     catch E:R:ST ->
  306:         ct:log("Could not parse: ~ts~n", [Str]),
  307:         erlang:raise(E,R,ST)
  308:     end.
  309: 
  310: run_unbuffer_escript(Rows, Columns, EScript, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut) ->
  311:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  312:     TmpFile = filename:join(DataDir, "tmp"),
  313:     ok = file:write_file(TmpFile, <<>>),
  314:     CommandModifier =
  315:         case {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} of
  316:             {false, false} -> "";
  317:             {true, false} -> io_lib:format(" < ~s", [TmpFile]);
  318:             {false, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile]);
  319:             {true, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s < ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile, TmpFile])
  320:         end,
  321:     Command = io_lib:format("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty rows ~p; stty columns ~p; escript ~s ~s\"",
  322:                             [Rows, Columns, EScript, CommandModifier]),
  323:     %% io:format("Command: ~s ~n", [Command]),
  324:     Out = os:cmd(Command),
  325:     %% io:format("Out: ~p ~n", [Out]),
  326:     string_to_term(Out).
  327: 
  328: get_columns_and_rows_escript(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  329:     ExpectUnbufferInstalled =
  330:         try
  331:             "79" = string:trim(os:cmd("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty columns 79 ; tput cols\"")),
  332:             true
  333:         catch
  334:             _:_ -> false
  335:         end,
  336:     case ExpectUnbufferInstalled of
  337:         false ->
  338:             {skip,
  339:              "The unbuffer tool (https://core.tcl-lang.org/expect/index) does not seem to be installed.~n"
  340:              "On Ubuntu/Debian: \"sudo apt-get install expect\""};
  341:         true ->
  342:             DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  343:             IoColumnsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_columns.erl"),
  344:             IoRowsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_rows.erl"),
  345:             [
  346:              begin
  347:                  {ok, 42} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut),
  348:                  {ok, 99} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut)
  349:              end
  350:              ||
  351:                 {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} <- [{false, false}, {true, false}, {false, true}]
  352:             ],
  353:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, true, true),
  354:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, true, true),
  355:             ok
  356:     end.
  357: 
  358: %% Test that the shell can access columns and rows.
  359: get_columns_and_rows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  360:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  361: 	old ->
  362:             test_columns_and_rows(old, []);
  363: 	new ->
  364:             test_columns_and_rows(old, ["-oldshell"]),
  365:             test_columns_and_rows(new, [])
  366:     end,
  367:     ok.
  368: 
  369: test_columns_and_rows(old, Args) ->
  370:     rtnode:run(
  371:       [{putline, ""},
  372:        {putline, "2."},
  373:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  374:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  375:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"},
  376:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  377:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"}
  378:       ], [], [], Args),
  379: 
  380:     rtnode:run(
  381:       [{putline, ""},
  382:        {putline, "2."},
  383:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  384:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  385:        {expect, "{ok,90}\r\n"},
  386:        {putline,"io:rows()."},
  387:        {expect, "{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  388:       [],
  389:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ",
  390:       Args);
  391: test_columns_and_rows(new, _Args) ->
  392:     rtnode:run(
  393:       [{putline, ""},
  394:        {expect, "1> $"},
  395:        {putline, "2."},
  396:        {expect, "\r\n2\r\n"},
  397:        {expect, "> $"},
  398:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  399:        {expect, "{ok,80}\r\n"},
  400:        {expect, "> $"},
  401:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  402:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,24}\r\n"}
  403:       ]),
  404: 
  405:     rtnode:run(
  406:       [{putline, ""},
  407:        {expect, "1> $"},
  408:        {putline, "2."},
  409:        {expect,  "\r\n2\r\n"},
  410:        {expect, "> $"},
  411:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  412:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,90}\r\n"},
  413:        {expect, "> $"},
  414:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  415:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  416:       [],
  417:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ").
  418: 
  419: shell_navigation(Config) ->
  420: 
  421:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  422: 
  423:     try
  424:         [begin
  425:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}"),
  426:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward
  427:              check_content(Term, "{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}$"),
  428:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  429:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  430:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  431:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  432:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  433:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  434:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  435:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  436:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  437:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',")}),
  438:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  439:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  440:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  441:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b'")}),
  442:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  443:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  444:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  445:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
  446:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  447:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  448:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  449:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  450:              send_tty(Term,"C-H"),
  451:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  452:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  453:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  454:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  455:          end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  456:         ok
  457:     after
  458:         stop_tty(Term)
  459:     end.
  460: shell_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  461:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  462: 
  463:     try
  464:         [begin
  465:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  466:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,"),
  467:              check_location(Term, {0,width("{aaa,")}),
  468:              send_tty(Term,"\n'b"++U++"b',"),
  469:              check_location(Term, {0, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  470:              send_tty(Term,"\nccc}"),
  471:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward (blink)
  472:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  473:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  474:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  475:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  476:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  477:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  478:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  479:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc")}),
  480:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  481:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  482:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  483:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  484:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  485:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  486:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  487:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  488:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  489:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 1}),
  490:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  491:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b'")}),
  492:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  493:              check_location(Term, {-2, width("{aaa,")}),
  494:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  495:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  496:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  497:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  498:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  499:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U)}),
  500:              send_tty(Term,"M-<"),
  501:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  502:              send_tty(Term,"M->"),
  503:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  504:              check_location(Term, {0,width("ccc")}),
  505:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  506:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  507:              check_location(Term, {0,0}),
  508:              send_tty(Term,"C-h"), % Backspace
  509:              check_location(Term, {-1,width("ccc}")}),
  510:              send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  511:              send_tty(Term, "End"),
  512:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  513:              send_tty(Term,"M-Enter"),
  514:              check_content(Term, ".. ,"),
  515:              check_location(Term, {-1,0}),
  516:              send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  517:              check_location(Term, {-3,0}),
  518:              send_tty(Term,"{'"++U++"',\n\n\nworks}.\n")
  519:             end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  520:         ok
  521:     after
  522:         stop_tty(Term)
  523:     end.
  524: 
  525: shell_format(Config) ->
  526:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","format_shell_func","{shell,erl_pp_format_func}"]}|Config]),
  527:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  528:     EmacsFormat = "\""++DataDir ++ "emacs-format-file\"\n",
  529:     try
  530:         send_tty(Term1,"fun(X) ->\n  X\nend.\n"),
  531:         send_tty(Term1,"Up"),
  532:         %% Note, erl_pp puts 7 spaces before X
  533:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..        X\\s*.. end."),
  534:         send_tty(Term1, "Down"),
  535:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term1)," -x ",200]),
  536:         timer:sleep(1000),
  537:         send_stdin(Term1, "shell:format_shell_func(\"emacs -batch \${file} -l \"\n"),
  538:         send_stdin(Term1, EmacsFormat),
  539:         send_stdin(Term1, "\" -f emacs-format-function\").\n"),
  540:         check_content(Term1, "{shell,erl_pp_format_func}"),
  541:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  542:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  543:         send_tty(Term1, "\n"),
  544:         timer:sleep(1000),
  545:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  546:         %% Note, emacs-format puts 8 spaces before X
  547:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..         X\\s*.. end."),
  548:         send_tty(Term1, "Down"),
  549:         check_content(Term1, ">$"),
  550:         send_stdin(Term1, "shell:format_shell_func({bad,format}).\n"),
  551:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  552:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  553:         send_tty(Term1, "\n"),
  554:         timer:sleep(1000),
  555:         check_content(Term1, "\\Q* Bad format function: {bad,format}\\E"),
  556:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  557:         %% No modifications should be made, when default format function is used
  558:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..         X\\s*.. end."),
  559:         ok
  560:     after
  561:         stop_tty(Term1)
  562:     end.
  563: shell_multiline_prompt_ssh(Config) ->
  564:     Term1 = start_tty(Config),
  565:     try
  566:         send_tty(Term1, "shell:multiline_prompt_func({shell,inverted_space_prompt}).\n"),
  567:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  568:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  569:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  570:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  571:         ok
  572:     after
  573:         stop_tty(Term1)
  574:     end.
  575: shell_multiline_prompt(Config) ->
  576:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","{shell,inverted_space_prompt}"]}|Config]),
  577:     Term2 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","\"...> \""]}|Config]),
  578:     Term3 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","edlin"]}|Config]),
  579:     Term4 = start_tty(Config),
  580: 
  581:     try
  582:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  583:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  584:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  585:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  586:         ok
  587:     after
  588:         stop_tty(Term1)
  589:     end,
  590:     try
  591:         check_location(Term2, {0, 0}),
  592:         send_tty(Term2,"\na"),
  593:         check_location(Term2, {0, 1}),
  594:         check_content(Term2, "...> a"),
  595:         ok
  596:     after
  597:         stop_tty(Term2)
  598:     end,
  599:     try
  600:         send_tty(Term3,"\na"),
  601:         check_location(Term3, {0, 1}),
  602:         check_content(Term3, ".. a"),
  603:         ok
  604:     after
  605:         stop_tty(Term3)
  606:     end,
  607:     try
  608:         send_tty(Term4, "shell:multiline_prompt_func(\"-> \").\n"),
  609:         check_content(Term4, "default"),
  610:         send_tty(Term4, "a\nb"),
  611:         check_content(Term4, "-> b"),
  612:         ok
  613:     after
  614:         stop_tty(Term4)
  615:     end.
  616: 
  617: shell_clear(Config) ->
  618: 
  619:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  620:     {Rows, _Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  621: 
  622:     try
  623:         send_tty(Term,"foobar."),
  624:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  625:         check_content(Term, "foobar"),
  626:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  627:         send_tty(Term,"bazbat"),
  628:         check_location(Term, {0, 6}),
  629:         send_tty(Term,"C-L"),
  630:         check_location(Term, {-Rows+1, 6}),
  631:         check_content(Term, "bazbat")
  632:     after
  633:         stop_tty(Term)
  634:     end.
  635: 
  636: shell_xnfix(Config) ->
  637: 
  638:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  639: 
  640:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  641:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  642: 
  643:     As = lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1,"a"),
  644: 
  645:     try
  646:         [begin
  647:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  648:              send_tty(Term,As),
  649:              check_content(Term,[As,$$]),
  650:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - 1}),
  651:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  652:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  653:              send_tty(Term,"aaa"),
  654:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 3}),
  655:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,3 + width(U))],
  656:              send_tty(Term,U),
  657:              %% a{Cols-1}U\naaaaa
  658:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  659:                                  U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  660:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  661:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  662:              send_tty(Term,U),
  663:              %% a{Cols-1}U\nUaaaaa
  664:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  665:                                  U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  666:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  667:              %% send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  668:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  669:              %% a{Cols-2}U\nUaaaaa
  670:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  671:              %%                     U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  672:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  673:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  674:              %%                     U,U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  675:              %% send_tty(Term,"aa"),
  676:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  677:              %%                     U,"a\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  678:              %% check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  679:              send_tty(Term,"C-K"),
  680:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  681:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  682:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  683:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  684:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  685:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  686:              ok
  687:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  688:     after
  689:         stop_tty(Term)
  690:     end.
  691: 
  692: 
  693: %% Characters that are larger than 2 wide need special handling when they
  694: %% are at the end of the current line.
  695: shell_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  696: 
  697:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  698: 
  699:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  700:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  701: 
  702:     try
  703:         [begin
  704:              FirstLine = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U)*2 + 1,"a")],
  705:              OtherLineA = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"a")],
  706:              OtherLineB = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"b")],
  707:              OtherLineC = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"c")],
  708:              OtherLineD = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"d")],
  709:              send_tty(Term,FirstLine),
  710:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  711:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  712: 
  713:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineA),
  714:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  715:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  716: 
  717:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineB),
  718:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  719:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  720: 
  721:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineC),
  722:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  723:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  724: 
  725:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineD),
  726:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  727:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  728: 
  729:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  730:              check_location(Term, {-4, 0}), %% Broken
  731:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  732:              check_location(Term, {-4, width(U)}), %% Broken
  733: 
  734:              send_tty(Term,"DC"), %% Broken
  735:              check_content(Term, ["a.*",U,"$"]),
  736:              check_content(Term, ["^b.*",U,"c$"]),
  737:              check_content(Term, ["^c.*",U,"dd$"]),
  738: 
  739:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  740:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  741:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  742:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  743:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  744:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  745: 
  746:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  747:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  748:     after
  749:         stop_tty(Term)
  750:     end.
  751: 
  752: shell_delete(Config) ->
  753: 
  754:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  755: 
  756:     try
  757: 
  758:         [ begin
  759:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  760:               check_content(Term, "> a$"),
  761:               check_location(Term, {0, 1}),
  762:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  763:               check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  764:               check_content(Term, ">$"),
  765:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  766:               send_tty(Term,U),
  767:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a, U])}),
  768:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  769:               send_tty(Term,U),
  770:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U,$a,U])}),
  771:               check_content(Term, ["> a",U,$a,U,"$"]),
  772:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  773:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  774:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  775:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  776:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  777:               send_tty(Term,U),
  778:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U])}),
  779:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  780:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  781:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  782:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  783:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  784:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  785:               check_content(Term, ["> a$"]),
  786:               send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  787:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  788:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  789:               check_location(Term, {0, width([])})
  790:           end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  791:     after
  792:         stop_tty(Term)
  793:     end.
  794: 
  795: %% When deleting characters at the edge of the screen that are "large",
  796: %% we need to take special care.
  797: shell_delete_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  798: 
  799:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  800: 
  801:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  802:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  803: 
  804:     try
  805:         [begin
  806:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  807:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  808:              send_tty(Term,[U,U,"aaaaa"]),
  809:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,U,"aaaaa$"]),
  810:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,5+2)],
  811:              check_location(Term,{0,-Col}),
  812:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  813:              check_content(Term,"> a* \n"),
  814:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 1}),
  815:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  816:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  817:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 2}),
  818:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  819:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U," \n"]),
  820:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 3}),
  821:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  822:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"\n"]),
  823:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  824:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 4}),
  825:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  826:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"a\n"]),
  827:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  828:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 5}),
  829:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  830:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  831:     after
  832:         stop_tty(Term)
  833:     end.
  834: 
  835: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  836: %% to take extra care
  837: shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap(Config) ->
  838: 
  839:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  840: 
  841:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  842:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  843: 
  844:     try
  845:         [begin
  846:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  847:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  848:              send_tty(Term,["a",U,"aaaaa"]),
  849:              check_content(Term,["\na",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  850:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  851:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  852:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  853:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  854:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  855:              check_content(Term,["> a* \n"]),
  856:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  857:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  858:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  859:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  860:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  861:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"a\n"]),
  862:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  863:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  864:     after
  865:         stop_tty(Term)
  866:     end.
  867: 
  868: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  869: %% to take extra care
  870: shell_update_window_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  871: 
  872:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  873: 
  874:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  875:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  876: 
  877:     try
  878:         [begin
  879:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U) + 1,"a")),
  880:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  881:              send_tty(Term,[U,"aaaaa"]),
  882:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  883:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols+1]),
  884:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\naaaaa$"]),
  885:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols]),
  886:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  887:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  888:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  889:     after
  890:         stop_tty(Term)
  891:     end.
  892: 
  893: shell_transpose(Config) ->
  894: 
  895:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  896: 
  897:     Unicode = [[$a]] ++ hard_unicode(),
  898: 
  899:     try
  900:         [
  901:          begin
  902:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  903:              [send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U],
  904:              send_tty(Term,"b"),
  905:              [[send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U2] || U2 <- Unicode],
  906:              send_tty(Term,"cde"),
  907:              check_content(Term, ["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  908:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde"])}),
  909:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  910:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  911:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  912:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  913:              check_location(Term, {0, 1+width([U])}),
  914:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  915:              check_content(Term, ["ab",U,Unicode,"cde$"]),
  916:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  917:              check_content(Term, ["ab",hd(Unicode),U,tl(Unicode),"cde$"]),
  918:              [send_tty(Term,"C-T") || _ <- lists:seq(1,length(Unicode)-1)],
  919:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,U,"cde$"]),
  920:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  921:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de$"]),
  922:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U])}),
  923:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  924:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de"])}),
  925:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  926:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  927:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  928:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  929:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  930:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  931:          end || U <- Unicode],
  932:         ok
  933:     after
  934:         stop_tty(Term),
  935:         ok
  936:     end.
  937: 
  938: shell_search(C) ->
  939:     Term = start_tty(C),
  940: 
  941:     try
  942:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  943:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  944:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  945:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  946:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  947:         send_tty(Term,[16#1f600]),
  948:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  949:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  950:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  951:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  952:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  953:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  954:         send_tty(Term,"C-a"),
  955:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(C, "'a'.")}),
  956:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  957:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  958:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  959:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  960:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  961:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  962:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*a."),
  963:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  964:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  965:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  966:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  967:         send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  968:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  969:         ok
  970:     after
  971:         stop_tty(Term),
  972:         ok
  973:     end.
  974: 
  975: shell_insert(Config) ->
  976:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  977: 
  978:     try
  979:         send_tty(Term,"abcdefghijklm"),
  980:         check_content(Term, "abcdefghijklm$"),
  981:         check_location(Term, {0, 13}),
  982:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  983:         send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  984:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  985:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  986:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  987:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  988:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijklm$"),
  989:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
  990:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  991:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  992:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  993:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijlm$"),
  994:         ok
  995:     after
  996:         stop_tty(Term)
  997:     end.
  998: 
  999: shell_update_window(Config) ->
 1000:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1001: 
 1002:     Text = lists:flatten(["abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm"]),
 1003:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
 1004: 
 1005:     try
 1006:         send_tty(Term,Text),
 1007:         check_content(Term,Text),
 1008:         check_location(Term, {0, width(Text)}),
 1009:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col+1]),
 1010:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
 1011:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
 1012:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1013:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(Text)}),
 1014:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col]),
 1015:         %% When resizing, tmux does not xnfix the cursor, so it will remain
 1016:         %% at the previous locations
 1017:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(Text)}),
 1018:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
 1019:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 1}),
 1020: 
 1021:         %% When we do backspace here, tmux seems to place the cursor in an
 1022:         %% incorrect position except when a terminal is attached.
 1023:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1024:         %% This really should be {0, -Col}, but sometimes tmux sets it to
 1025:         %% {-1, width(Text)} instead.
 1026:         check_location(Term, [{0, -Col}, {-1, width(Text)}]),
 1027: 
 1028:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text) div 2 + Col]),
 1029:         %% Depending on what happened with the cursor above, the line will be
 1030:         %% different here.
 1031:         check_location(Term, [{0, -Col + width(Text) div 2},
 1032:                               {-1, -Col + width(Text) div 2}]),
 1033:         ok
 1034:     after
 1035:         stop_tty(Term)
 1036:     end.
 1037: shell_small_window_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
 1038:     Term0 = start_tty(Config),
 1039:     tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term0)," -x ",30, " -y ", 6]),
 1040:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term0),
 1041:     Term = Term0#tmux{orig_location = {Row, Col}},
 1042:     Text = ("xbcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
 1043:         "abcdefghijkl\n"++
 1044:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
 1045:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklx"),
 1046:     try
 1047:         send_tty(Term,Text),
 1048:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
 1049:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
 1050:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1051:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
 1052:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
 1053:         send_tty(Term, "C-Down"),
 1054:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1055:         send_tty(Term, "Left"),
 1056:         check_location(Term, {-1, -4}),
 1057:         send_tty(Term, "Right"),
 1058:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1059:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4A"),
 1060:         check_location(Term, {-5, 0}),
 1061:         check_content(Term,"xbc"),
 1062:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4B"),
 1063:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
 1064:         check_content(Term,"klx"),
 1065:         send_tty(Term, " sets:is_e\t"),
 1066:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
 1067:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
 1068:         check_location(Term, {-3, 6}),
 1069:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
 1070:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
 1071:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
 1072:         send_tty(Term, "sets:is_e\t"),
 1073:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
 1074:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
 1075:         check_location(Term, {-4, 9}),
 1076:         send_tty(Term, "M-Enter"),
 1077:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1078:         ok
 1079:     after
 1080:         stop_tty(Term)
 1081:     end.
 1082: shell_huge_input(Config) ->
 1083:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1084: 
 1085:     ManyUnicode = lists:duplicate(100,hard_unicode()),
 1086: 
 1087:     try
 1088:         send_tty(Term,ManyUnicode),
 1089:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode_match(Config) ++ "$",
 1090:                       #{ replace => {"\n",""} }),
 1091:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1092:         ok
 1093:     after
 1094:         stop_tty(Term)
 1095:     end.
 1096: output_to_stdout_slowly(5) -> ok;
 1097: output_to_stdout_slowly(N) ->
 1098:     receive
 1099:         after 100 ->
 1100:             io:format("~p~n", [N]),
 1101:             output_to_stdout_slowly(N+1)
 1102:     end.
 1103: 
 1104: shell_receive_standard_out(Config) ->
 1105:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1106:     try
 1107:         send_tty(Term, "spawn(interactive_shell_SUITE, output_to_stdout_slowly, [0]). ABC\n"),
 1108:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1109:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that we are at the same location relative to the start.
 1110:         check_content(Term, "3\\s+4\\s+.+>\\sABC"),
 1111:         ok
 1112:     after
 1113:         stop_tty(Term)
 1114:     end.
 1115: %% Test that the shell works when invalid utf-8 (aka latin1) is sent to it
 1116: shell_invalid_unicode(Config) ->
 1117:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1118: 
 1119:     InvalidUnicode = <<$,$,$>>, %%  in latin1
 1120: 
 1121:     try
 1122:         send_tty(Term,hard_unicode()),
 1123:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode() ++ "$"),
 1124:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1125:         check_content(Term, "illegal character"),
 1126:         %% Send invalid utf-8
 1127:         send_stdin(Term,InvalidUnicode),
 1128:         %% Check that the utf-8 was echoed
 1129:         check_content(Term, "\\\\345\\\\344\\\\366$"),
 1130:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1131:         %% Check that the terminal entered "latin1" mode
 1132:         send_tty(Term,"."),
 1133:         check_content(Term, "\\Q\\360\\237\\230\\200\\355\\225\\234.\\E$"),
 1134:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1135:         %% Check that we can reset the encoding to unicode
 1136:         send_tty(Term,"io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."),
 1137:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1138:         check_content(Term, "\nok\n"),
 1139:         send_tty(Term,""),
 1140:         check_content(Term, "$"),
 1141:         ok
 1142:     after
 1143:         stop_tty(Term),
 1144:         ok
 1145:     end.
 1146: 
 1147: 
 1148: %% Test the we can handle ansi insert, navigation and delete
 1149: %%   We currently can not so skip this test
 1150: shell_support_ansi_input(Config) ->
 1151: 
 1152:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1153: 
 1154:     BoldText = "\e[;1m",
 1155:     ClearText = "\e[0m",
 1156: 
 1157:     try
 1158:         send_tty(Term,["{",BoldText,"ab",ClearText,"}"]),
 1159:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1160:         try check_location(Term, {0, width("{1mabm}")}) of
 1161:             _ ->
 1162:                 throw({skip, "Do not support ansi input"})
 1163:         catch _:_ ->
 1164:                 ok
 1165:         end,
 1166:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{ab}")}),
 1167:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term,"-e") end,
 1168:                       ["{", BoldText, "ab", ClearText, "}"]),
 1169:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1170:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1171:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a")}),
 1172:         send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
 1173:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
 1174:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
 1175:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1176:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1177:         check_content(Term, ["{", BoldText, "a"]),
 1178:         ok
 1179:     after
 1180:         stop_tty(Term),
 1181:         ok
 1182:     end.
 1183: 
 1184: shell_expand_location_below(Config) ->
 1185: 
 1186:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1187: 
 1188:     {Rows, _} = get_window_size(Term),
 1189:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
 1190: 
 1191:     NumFunctions = lists:seq(0, Row*2),
 1192:     FunctionName = "a_long_function_name",
 1193: 
 1194:     Module = lists:flatten(
 1195:                ["-module(long_module).\n",
 1196:                 "-export([",lists:join($,,[io_lib:format("~s~p/0",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]),"]).\n\n",
 1197:                 [io_lib:format("~s~p() -> ok.\n",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]]),
 1198: 
 1199:     DoScan = fun F([]) ->
 1200:                      [];
 1201:                  F(Str) ->
 1202:                      {done,{ok,T,_},C} = erl_scan:tokens([],Str,0),
 1203:                      [ T | F(C) ]
 1204:              end,
 1205:     Forms = [ begin {ok,Y} = erl_parse:parse_form(X),Y end || X <- DoScan(Module) ],
 1206:     {ok,_,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms, [debug_info]),
 1207: 
 1208:     try
 1209:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1210:         Cols = 80,
 1211: 
 1212:         %% First check that basic completion works
 1213:         send_tty(Term, "escript:"),
 1214:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1215:         %% Cursor at correct place
 1216:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:")}),
 1217:         %% Nothing after the start( completion
 1218:         check_content(Term, "start\\($"),
 1219: 
 1220:         %% Check that completion is cleared when we type
 1221:         send_tty(Term, "s"),
 1222:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:s")}),
 1223:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1224: 
 1225:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a term
 1226:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1227:         send_tty(Term, "["),
 1228:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1229:         send_tty(Term, ", test_after]"),
 1230:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", test_after]"],
 1231:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1232:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("[escript:s")}),
 1233:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1234:         send_tty(Term, "C-K"),
 1235: 
 1236:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a long term
 1237:         send_tty(Term, ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"),
 1238:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"],
 1239:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1240:         check_location(Term, {-4, width("[escript:s")}),
 1241:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1242:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1243:         send_tty(Term, ".\n"),
 1244: 
 1245:         %% Check that we behave as we should with very long completions
 1246:         rpc(Term, fun() ->
 1247:                           {module, long_module} = code:load_binary(long_module, "long_module.beam", Bin)
 1248:                   end),
 1249:         check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1250:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -y 50"]),
 1251:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1252:         Result = 61,
 1253:         Rows1 = 48,
 1254:         send_tty(Term, "long_module:" ++ FunctionName),
 1255:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1256:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1257: 
 1258:         %% Check that correct text is printed below expansion
 1259:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1260:                                           [1, 7, Result])),
 1261:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1262:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1263:             [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1264:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1265:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1266:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1267:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1268:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1269:                                           [7, Rows1+6, Result])),
 1270:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1271:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1272:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1273:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1274:         %% Overshoot up
 1275:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1276:                                           [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1277:         %% Overshoot down
 1278:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1279:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1280:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1281:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1282:                                           [14, Rows1+13, Result])),
 1283:         check_content(Term, "\n.*a_long_function_name99\\("),
 1284:         send_tty(Term, "Up"),
 1285:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1286:                                           [13, Rows1+12, Result])),
 1287: 
 1288:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1289: 
 1290:         %% We resize the terminal to make everything fit and test that
 1291:         %% expand below displays everything
 1292:         tmux(["resize-window -t ", tty_name(Term), " -y ", integer_to_list(Row+10)]),
 1293:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1294:         send_tty(Term, "\t\t"),
 1295:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name99\\($"),
 1296: 
 1297:         %% Check that doing an expansion when cursor is in xnfix position works
 1298:         send_tty(Term, "BSpace"),
 1299:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:a_long_function_nam$"),
 1300:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1301:         send_tty(Term, lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(", long_module:a_long_function_name"), "a")),
 1302:         send_tty(Term, ", "),
 1303:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1304:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1305:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1306:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1307:         check_content(Term, "3> a+, long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\n\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1308:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1309:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1310:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1311:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1312:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1313: 
 1314:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1315:         send_tty(Term, lists:duplicate(Cols, "b")),
 1316:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1317:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1318:         check_content(Term, "3> b+\nb+a+, long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\n\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1319:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1320:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1321:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1322:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1323:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1324: 
 1325:         ok
 1326:     after
 1327:         stop_tty(Term),
 1328:         ok
 1329:     end.
 1330: 
 1331: shell_expand_location_above(Config) ->
 1332: 
 1333:     Term = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_expand_location","above"]}|Config]),
 1334: 
 1335:     try
 1336:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1337:         send_tty(Term, "escript:"),
 1338:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1339:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:")}),
 1340:         check_content(Term, "start\\(\n"),
 1341:         check_content(Term, "escript:$"),
 1342:         send_tty(Term, "s"),
 1343:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1344:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:s")}),
 1345:         check_content(Term, "\nscript_name\\([ ]+start\\(\n"),
 1346:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1347:         ok
 1348:     after
 1349:         stop_tty(Term),
 1350:         ok
 1351:     end.
 1352: 
 1353: shell_help(Config) ->
 1354:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1355:     try
 1356:         send_tty(Term, "application:put_env(kernel, shell_docs_ansi, false).\n"),
 1357:         send_tty(Term, "lists"),
 1358:         send_tty(Term, "\^[h"),
 1359:         %% Check we can see the first line
 1360:         check_content(Term, "List processing functions."),
 1361:         check_not_in_content(Term, "less than or equal to"),
 1362:         %% Expand the help area to take up the whole buffer.
 1363:         send_tty(Term, "\^[h"),
 1364:         %% Check that we can see the last line (lists help should fit in the window)
 1365:         check_content(Term, "less than or equal to"),
 1366:         send_tty(Term, ":all"),
 1367:         send_tty(Term, "\^[h"),
 1368:         check_content(Term, ~S"all\(Pred, List\)"),
 1369:         ok
 1370:     after
 1371:         stop_tty(Term),
 1372:         ok
 1373:     end.
 1374: %% Test the we can handle invalid ansi escape chars.
 1375: %%   tmux cannot handle this... so we test this using to_erl
 1376: shell_invalid_ansi(_Config) ->
 1377: 
 1378:     InvalidAnsiPrompt =
 1379:         case proplists:get_value(encoding, io:getopts(user)) of
 1380:             unicode ->
 1381:                 ["\e]94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e]0m"];
 1382:             latin1 ->
 1383:                 ["\e]94minvalid_test\e]0m"]
 1384:         end,
 1385: 
 1386:     rtnode:run(
 1387:       [{eval, fun() -> application:set_env(
 1388:                          stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1389:                          fun() -> InvalidAnsiPrompt end)
 1390:               end },
 1391:        {putline,"a."},
 1392:        {expect, "a[.]"},
 1393:        {expect, ["\\Q",InvalidAnsiPrompt,"\\E"]}],
 1394:       "", "",
 1395:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1396:        "-connect_all","false",
 1397:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1398:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1399:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1400:        "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1401:       ]).
 1402: 
 1403: shell_get_password(_Config) ->
 1404:    
 1405:     rtnode:run(
 1406:       [{putline,"io:get_password(group_leader())."},
 1407:        {putline,"secret\r"},
 1408:        {expect, "\r\n\"secret\""}]),
 1409: 
 1410:     rtnode:run(
 1411:         [{eval,fun() -> shell:start_interactive({noshell, raw}) end},
 1412:         {eval,
 1413:             fun() ->
 1414:                 io:format(user, "Enter password: ", []),
 1415:                 spawn(fun() -> io:format(user, "~nPassword was: ~ts~n",[io:get_password(user)]) end),
 1416:                 ok
 1417:             end},
 1418:         {expect, "Enter password: "},
 1419:         {putline,"secret"},
 1420:         {expect, "^\nPassword was: secret\n"}],
 1421:         "", "", ["-noshell"]),
 1422: 
 1423:     %% io:get_password only works when run in "newshell", or "noshell/raw"
 1424:     rtnode:run(
 1425:       [{putline,"io:get_password()."},
 1426:        {expect, "\\Q{error,enotsup}\\E"}],
 1427:      "","",["-oldshell"]).
 1428: 
 1429: 
 1430: shell_ignore_pager_commands(Config) ->
 1431:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1432:     case code:get_doc(file, #{sources=>[eep48]}) of
 1433:         {error, _} -> {skip, "No documentation available"};
 1434:         _ ->
 1435:             try
 1436:                 send_tty(Term, "h(file).\n"),
 1437:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qmore (y/n)? (y)\\E"),
 1438:                 send_tty(Term, "n\n"),
 1439:                 check_content(Term,"ok"),
 1440:                 send_tty(Term, "C-P"),
 1441:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qh(file).\\E"),
 1442:                 ok
 1443:             after
 1444:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1445:                 ok
 1446:             end
 1447:     end.
 1448: test_valid_keymap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1449:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1450:     Term = setup_tty([{args, ["-config", DataDir ++ "valid_keymap.config"]} | Config]),
 1451:     set_tty_prompt(Term, Config),
 1452:     try
 1453:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid key"),
 1454:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid function"),
 1455:         send_tty(Term, "asdf"),
 1456:         send_tty(Term, "C-u"),
 1457:         check_content(Term, ">$"),
 1458:         send_tty(Term, "1.\n"),
 1459:         send_tty(Term, "C-b"),
 1460:         check_content(Term, "2>\\s1.$"),
 1461:         ok
 1462:     after
 1463:         stop_tty(Term),
 1464:         ok
 1465:     end.
 1466: 
 1467: test_invalid_keymap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1468:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1469:     Term1 = setup_tty([{args, ["-config", DataDir ++ "invalid_keymap.config"]} | Config]),
 1470:     set_tty_prompt(Term1, Config),
 1471:     try
 1472:         check_content(Term1, "Invalid key"),
 1473:         check_content(Term1, "Invalid function"),
 1474:         send_tty(Term1, "asdf"),
 1475:         send_tty(Term1, "C-u"),
 1476:         check_content(Term1, ">$"),
 1477:         ok
 1478:     after
 1479:         stop_tty(Term1),
 1480:         ok
 1481:     end.
 1482: external_editor(Config) ->
 1483:     case os:find_executable("nano") of
 1484:         false -> {skip, "nano is not installed"};
 1485:         _ ->
 1486:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1487:             try
 1488:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1489:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1490:                 send_tty(Term, "\"some text with\nnewline in it\""),
 1491:                 check_content(Term,"3> \"some text with\\s*\n.+\\s*newline in it\""),
 1492:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"),
 1493:                 check_content(Term,"GNU nano [\\d.]+"),
 1494:                 check_content(Term,"\"some text with\\s*\n\\s*newline in it\""),
 1495:                 send_tty(Term, "Right"),
 1496:                 send_tty(Term, "still"),
 1497:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1498:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% save in nano
 1499:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1500:                 send_tty(Term, "C-X"), %% quit in nano
 1501:                 check_content(Term,"3> \"still\\s*\n\\s*.+\\s*some text with\\s*\n.+\\s*newline in it\""),
 1502:                 send_tty(Term,".\n"),
 1503:                 check_content(Term,"\\Q\"still\\nsome text with\\nnewline in it\"\\E"),
 1504:                 ok
 1505:             after
 1506:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1507:                 ok
 1508:             end
 1509:     end.
 1510: 
 1511: external_editor_visual(Config) ->
 1512:     case os:find_executable("vim") of
 1513:         false ->
 1514:             {skip, "vim is not installed"};
 1515:         _ ->
 1516:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1517:             try
 1518:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1519:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1520:                 check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1521:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"VISUAL\",\"vim -u DEFAULTS -U NONE -i NONE\").\n"),
 1522:                 check_content(Term, "4>"),
 1523:                 send_tty(Term,"\"hello"),
 1524:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% Open vim
 1525:                 check_content(Term, "^\"hello"),
 1526:                 send_tty(Term, "$"), %% Set cursor at end
 1527:                 send_tty(Term, "a"), %% Enter insert mode at end
 1528:                 check_content(Term, "-- INSERT --"),
 1529:                 send_tty(Term, "\"."),
 1530:                 send_tty(Term,"Escape"),
 1531:                 send_tty(Term,":wq"),
 1532:                 send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1533:                 check_content(Term, "\"hello\"[.]$"),
 1534:                 send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1535:                 check_content(Term, "\"hello\""),
 1536:                 check_content(Term, "5>$")
 1537:             after
 1538:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1539:                 ok
 1540:             end
 1541:     end.
 1542: 
 1543: external_editor_unicode(Config) ->
 1544:     NanoPath = os:find_executable("nano"),
 1545:     case NanoPath of
 1546:         false -> {skip, "nano is not installed"};
 1547:         _ ->
 1548:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1549:             try
 1550:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1551:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1552:                 send_tty(Term, hard_unicode()),
 1553:                 check_content(Term,"3> " ++ hard_unicode_match(Config)),
 1554:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% open external editor (nano)
 1555:                 check_content(Term,"GNU nano [\\d.]+"),
 1556:                 send_tty(Term, "still "),
 1557:                 check_content(Term,"\nstill "),
 1558:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% save in nano
 1559:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1560:                 send_tty(Term, "C-X"), %% quit in nano
 1561:                 check_content(Term,"still "++hard_unicode_match(Config)),
 1562:                 ok
 1563:             after
 1564:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1565:                 ok
 1566:             end
 1567:     end.
 1568: 
 1569: %% There used to be a race condition when using shell:start_interactive where
 1570: %% the newline handling of standard_error did not change correctly to compensate
 1571: %% for the tty changing to canonical mode
 1572: shell_standard_error_nlcr(Config) ->
 1573: 
 1574:     [
 1575:      begin
 1576:          Term = setup_tty([{env,[{"TERM",TERM}]},{args, ["-noshell"]} | Config]),
 1577:          try
 1578:              rpc(Term, io, format, [standard_error,"test~ntest~ntest", []]),
 1579:              check_content(Term, "test\ntest\ntest$"),
 1580:              rpc(Term, fun() -> shell:start_interactive(),
 1581:                                 io:format(standard_error,"test~ntest~ntest", [])
 1582:                        end),
 1583:              check_content(Term, "test\ntest\ntest(\n|.)*test\ntest\ntest")
 1584:          after
 1585:              stop_tty(Term)
 1586:          end
 1587:      end || TERM <- ["dumb",os:getenv("TERM")]].
 1588: 
 1589: %% We test that suspending of `erl` and then resuming restores the shell
 1590: shell_suspend(Config) ->
 1591: 
 1592:     Name = peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path,Config)),
 1593:     %% In order to suspend `erl` we need it to run in a shell that has job control
 1594:     %% so we start the peer within a tmux window instead of having it be the original
 1595:     %% process.
 1596:     os:cmd("tmux new-window -n " ++ Name ++ " -d -- bash --norc"),
 1597: 
 1598:     Peer = #{ name => Name,
 1599:               post_process_args =>
 1600:                         fun(["new-window","-n",_,"-d","--"|CmdAndArgs]) ->
 1601:                                 FlatCmdAndArgs =
 1602:                                       lists:join(
 1603:                                         " ",[[$',A,$'] || A <- CmdAndArgs]),
 1604:                                 ["send","-t",Name,lists:flatten(FlatCmdAndArgs),"Enter"]
 1605:                         end
 1606:             },
 1607: 
 1608: 
 1609:     Term = start_tty([{peer, Peer}|Config]),
 1610: 
 1611:     try
 1612:         send_tty(Term, hard_unicode()),
 1613:         check_content(Term,["2> ",hard_unicode(),"$"]),
 1614:         send_tty(Term, "C-Z"),
 1615:         check_content(Term,"\\Q[1]+\\E\\s*Stopped"),
 1616:         send_tty(Term, "fg"),
 1617:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1618:         send_tty(Term, "M-l"),
 1619:         check_content(Term,["2> ",hard_unicode(),"$"]),
 1620:         check_location(Term,{0,width(hard_unicode())}),
 1621:         ok
 1622:     after
 1623:         stop_tty(Term),
 1624:         ok
 1625:     end.
 1626: 
 1627: %% We test that suspending of `erl` and then resuming restores the shell
 1628: shell_full_queue(Config) ->
 1629: 
 1630:     [throw({skip,"Need unbuffer (apt install expect) to run"}) || os:find_executable("unbuffer") =:= false],
 1631: 
 1632:     %% In order to fill the read buffer of the terminal we need to get a
 1633:     %% bit creative. We first need to start erl in bash in order to be
 1634:     %% able to get access to job control for suspended processes.
 1635:     %% We then also wrap `erl` in `unbuffer -p` so that we can suspend
 1636:     %% that program in order to block writing to stdout for a while.
 1637: 
 1638:     Name = peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path,Config)),
 1639:     os:cmd("tmux new-window -n " ++ Name ++ " -d -- bash --norc"),
 1640: 
 1641:     Peer = #{ name => Name,
 1642:               post_process_args =>
 1643:                         fun(["new-window","-n",_,"-d","--"|CmdAndArgs]) ->
 1644:                                 FlatCmdAndArgs = ["unbuffer -p "] ++
 1645:                                       lists:join(
 1646:                                         " ",[[$',A,$'] || A <- CmdAndArgs]),
 1647:                                 ["send","-t",Name,lists:flatten(FlatCmdAndArgs),"Enter"]
 1648:                         end
 1649:             },
 1650: 
 1651: 
 1652:     Term = start_tty([{peer, Peer}|Config]),
 1653:     UnbufferedPid = os:cmd("ps -o ppid= -p " ++ rpc(Term,os,getpid,[])),
 1654: 
 1655:     WriteUntilStopped =
 1656:         fun F(Char, Term) ->
 1657:                 rpc(Term,io,format,[user,[Char],[]]),
 1658:                 put(bytes,get(bytes,0)+1),
 1659:                 receive
 1660:                     stop ->
 1661:                         rpc(Term,io,format,[user,[Char+1],[]])
 1662:                 after 0 -> F(Char, Term)
 1663:                 end
 1664:         end,
 1665: 
 1666:     WaitUntilBlocked =
 1667:         fun(Pid, Ref) ->
 1668:                 (fun F(Cnt) ->
 1669:                          receive
 1670:                              {'DOWN',Ref,_,_,_} = Down ->
 1671:                                  ct:fail({io_format_did_not_block, Down})
 1672:                          after 1000 ->
 1673:                                  ok
 1674:                          end,
 1675:                          case process_info(Pid,dictionary) of
 1676:                              {dictionary,[{bytes,Cnt}]} ->
 1677:                                  ct:log("Bytes until blocked: ~p~n",[Cnt]),
 1678:                                  %% Add one extra byte as for
 1679:                                  %% the current blocking call
 1680:                                  Cnt + 1;
 1681:                              {dictionary,[{bytes,NewCnt}]} ->
 1682:                                  F(NewCnt)
 1683:                          end
 1684:                  end)(0)
 1685:         end,
 1686: 
 1687:     try
 1688:         %% First test that we can suspend and then resume
 1689:         os:cmd("kill -TSTP " ++ UnbufferedPid),
 1690:         check_content(Term,"\\Q[1]+\\E\\s*Stopped"),
 1691:         {Pid, Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> WriteUntilStopped($a, Term) end),
 1692:         WaitUntilBlocked(Pid, Ref),
 1693:         send_tty(Term, "fg"),
 1694:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1695:         Pid ! stop,
 1696:         check_content(Term,"b\\s+\\([^)]*\\)2>$")
 1697:     after
 1698:         stop_tty(Term),
 1699:         ok
 1700:     end,
 1701:     Name2 = peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path,Config))++"_2",
 1702:     os:cmd("tmux new-window -n " ++ Name2 ++ " -d -- bash --norc"),
 1703: 
 1704:     Peer2 = #{ name => Name2,
 1705:               post_process_args =>
 1706:                         fun(["new-window","-n",_,"-d","--"|CmdAndArgs]) ->
 1707:                                 FlatCmdAndArgs = ["unbuffer -p "] ++
 1708:                                       lists:join(
 1709:                                         " ",[[$',A,$'] || A <- CmdAndArgs]),
 1710:                                 ["send","-t",Name2,lists:flatten(FlatCmdAndArgs),"Enter"]
 1711:                         end
 1712:             },
 1713: 
 1714:     Term1 = setup_tty([{peer, Peer2},{args, ["-noshell"]}|Config]),
 1715:     UnbufferedPid1 = os:cmd("ps -o ppid= -p " ++ rpc(Term1,os,getpid,[])),
 1716:     try
 1717:         %% Then we test that all characters are written when system
 1718:         %% is terminated just after writing
 1719:         {ok,Cols} = rpc(Term1,io,columns,[user]),
 1720:         send_tty(Term1, "Enter"),
 1721:         os:cmd("kill -TSTP " ++ UnbufferedPid1),
 1722:         check_content(Term1,"\\Q[1]+\\E\\s*Stopped"),
 1723:         {Pid2, Ref2} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> WriteUntilStopped($c, Term1) end),
 1724:         Bytes = WaitUntilBlocked(Pid2, Ref2) - 1,
 1725:         stop_tty(Term1),
 1726:         send_tty(Term1, "fg"),
 1727:         send_tty(Term1, "Enter"),
 1728:         check_content(
 1729:           fun() ->
 1730:                   tmux(["capture-pane -p -S - -E - -t ",tty_name(Term1)])
 1731:           end, lists:flatten([lists:duplicate(Cols,$c) ++ "\n" ||
 1732:                                  _ <- lists:seq(1,(Bytes) div Cols)]
 1733:                              ++ [lists:duplicate((Bytes) rem Cols,$c)])),
 1734:         ct:log("~ts",[tmux(["capture-pane -p -S - -E - -t ",tty_name(Term)])]),
 1735:         ok
 1736:     after
 1737:         stop_tty(Term1),
 1738:         ok
 1739:     end.
 1740: 
 1741: get(Key,Default) ->
 1742:     case get(Key) of
 1743:         undefined ->
 1744:             Default;
 1745:         Value ->
 1746:             Value
 1747:     end.
 1748: 
 1749: %% A list of unicode graphemes that are notoriously hard to render
 1750: hard_unicode() ->
 1751:     ZWJ =
 1752:         case os:type() of
 1753:             %% macOS has very good rendering of ZWJ,
 1754:             %% but the cursor does not agree with it..
 1755:             {unix, darwin} -> [];
 1756:             _ -> [[16#1F91A,16#1F3FC]]    % Hand with skintone 
 1757:         end,
 1758:     [[16#1f600],             % Smilie 
 1759:     "",                   % Hangul
 1760:     "Z","a","l","g","o" %% Vertically stacked chars
 1761:      %%"",            % Zero width joiner
 1762:      %%""                % Zero width joiner
 1763:      | ZWJ].
 1764: 
 1765: hard_unicode_match(Config) ->
 1766:     ["\\Q",[unicode_to_octet(Config, U) || U <- hard_unicode()],"\\E"].
 1767: 
 1768: unicode_to_octet(Config, U) ->
 1769:     case ?config(encoding,Config) of
 1770:         unicode -> U;
 1771:         latin1 -> unicode_to_octet(U)
 1772:     end.
 1773: 
 1774: unicode_to_octet(U) ->
 1775:     [if Byte >= 128 -> [$\\,integer_to_list(Byte,8)];
 1776:         true -> Byte
 1777:      end || <<Byte>> <= unicode:characters_to_binary(U)].
 1778: 
 1779: unicode_to_hex(Config, U) ->
 1780:     case ?config(encoding,Config) of
 1781:         unicode -> U;
 1782:         latin1 -> unicode_to_hex(U)
 1783:     end.
 1784: 
 1785: unicode_to_hex(U) when is_integer(U) ->
 1786:     unicode_to_hex([U]);
 1787: unicode_to_hex(Us) ->
 1788:     [if U < 128 -> U;
 1789:         U < 512 -> ["\\",integer_to_list(U,8)];
 1790:         true -> ["\\x{",integer_to_list(U,16),"}"]
 1791:      end || U <- Us].
 1792: 
 1793: width(C, Str) ->
 1794:     case ?config(encoding, C) of
 1795:         unicode -> width(Str);
 1796:         latin1 -> width(unicode_to_octet(Str))
 1797:     end.
 1798: width(Str) ->
 1799:     lists:sum(
 1800:       [npwcwidth(CP) || CP <- lists:flatten(Str)]).
 1801: 
 1802: npwcwidth(CP) ->
 1803:     try prim_tty:npwcwidth(CP)
 1804:     catch error:undef ->
 1805:             if CP =:= 16#D55C ->
 1806:                     2; %% 
 1807:                CP =:= 16#1f91A ->
 1808:                     2; %% hand
 1809:                CP =:= 16#1F3Fc ->
 1810:                     2; %% Skintone
 1811:                CP =:= 16#1f600 ->
 1812:                     2; %% smilie
 1813:                true ->
 1814:                     case lists:member(CP, [775,776,780,785,786,787,788,791,793,794,
 1815:                                            804,813,848,852,854,858,871,875,878]) of
 1816:                         true ->
 1817:                             0;
 1818:                         false ->
 1819:                             1
 1820:                     end
 1821:             end
 1822:     end.
 1823: 
 1824: tmux([Cmd|_] = Command) when is_list(Cmd) ->
 1825:     tmux(lists:concat(Command));
 1826: tmux(Command) ->
 1827:     string:trim(os:cmd(["tmux ",Command])).
 1828: 
 1829: rpc(#tmux{ node = N }, Fun) ->
 1830:     erpc:call(N, Fun).
 1831: rpc(#tmux{ node = N }, M, F, A) ->
 1832:     erpc:call(N, M, F, A).
 1833: 
 1834: %% Setup a TTY, or a ssh server and client but do not type anything in terminal (except password)
 1835: setup_tty(Config) ->
 1836:     ClientName = maps:get(name,proplists:get_value(peer, Config, #{}),
 1837:                     peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path, Config))),
 1838: 
 1839:     PG = get_top_parent_test_group(Config),
 1840:     Name = if PG =:= ssh ->
 1841:             ClientName ++ "_ssh";
 1842:         true ->
 1843:             ClientName
 1844:     end,
 1845:     Envs = lists:flatmap(fun({Key,Value}) ->
 1846:                                  ["-env",Key,Value]
 1847:                          end, proplists:get_value(env,Config,[])),
 1848: 
 1849:     ExtraArgs = proplists:get_value(args,Config,[]),
 1850: 
 1851:     ExecArgs = case os:getenv("TMUX_DEBUG") of
 1852:                    "strace" ->
 1853:                        STraceLog = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1854:                                                  Name++".strace"),
 1855:                        ct:log("Link to strace: file://~ts", [STraceLog]),
 1856:                        [os:find_executable("strace"),"-f",
 1857:                         "-o",STraceLog,
 1858:                         "-e","trace=all",
 1859:                         "-e","read=0,1,2",
 1860:                         "-e","write=0,1,2"
 1861:                        ] ++ string:split(ct:get_progname()," ",all);
 1862:                    "rr" ->
 1863:                        [os:find_executable("cerl"),"-rr"];
 1864:                    _ ->
 1865:                        string:split(ct:get_progname()," ",all)
 1866:                end,
 1867:     DefaultPeerArgs = #{ name => Name,
 1868:                          exec =>
 1869:                              {os:find_executable("tmux"),
 1870:                               ["new-window","-n",Name,"-d","--"] ++ ExecArgs },
 1871: 
 1872:                          args => ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1873:                                   "-connect_all","false",
 1874: %                                  "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1875:                                   "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1876:                                   "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1877:                                   "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1878:                                  ] ++ Envs ++ ExtraArgs,
 1879:                          wait_boot => 60_000,
 1880:                          detached => false
 1881:                        },
 1882: 
 1883:     {ok, Peer, Node} =
 1884:         ?CT_PEER(maps:merge(proplists:get_value(peer,Config,#{}),
 1885:                             DefaultPeerArgs)),
 1886: 
 1887:     Self = self(),
 1888: 
 1889:     %% By default peer links with the starter. For these TCs we however only
 1890:     %% want the peer to die if we die, so we create a "unidirection link" using
 1891:     %% monitors.
 1892:     spawn(fun() ->
 1893:                   TCRef = erlang:monitor(process, Self),
 1894:                   PeerRef = erlang:monitor(process, Peer),
 1895:                   receive
 1896:                       {'DOWN',TCRef,_,_,Reason} ->
 1897:                           exit(Peer, Reason);
 1898:                       {'DOWN',PeerRef,_,_,_} ->
 1899:                           ok
 1900:                   end
 1901:           end),
 1902:     unlink(Peer),
 1903: 
 1904:     "" = tmux(["set-option -t ",Name," remain-on-exit on"]),
 1905: 
 1906:     %% We start tracing on the remote node in order to help debugging
 1907:     TraceLog = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),Name++".trace"),
 1908:     ct:log("Link to trace: file://~ts",[TraceLog]),
 1909: 
 1910:     spawn(Node,
 1911:           fun() ->
 1912:                   {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(file,TraceLog),
 1913:                   %% dbg:p(whereis(user_drv),[c,m]),
 1914:                   %% dbg:p(whereis(user_drv_writer),[c,m]),
 1915:                   %% dbg:p(whereis(user_drv_reader),[c,m]),
 1916:                   %% dbg:tp(user_drv,x),
 1917:                   %% dbg:tp(prim_tty,x),
 1918:                   %% dbg:tpl(prim_tty,write_nif,x),
 1919:                   %% dbg:tpl(prim_tty,read_nif,x),
 1920:                   monitor(process, Self),
 1921:                   receive _ -> ok end
 1922:           end),
 1923:     Tmux = #tmux{ peer = Peer, node = Node, name = ClientName },
 1924:     if PG =:= ssh ->
 1925:             rpc(Tmux, fun() ->
 1926:                 ssh:start(),
 1927:                 PrivDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "nopubkey"),
 1928:                 file:make_dir(PrivDir),
 1929:                 SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1930:                 {ok, _Sshd} = ssh:daemon(8989, [{system_dir, SysDir},
 1931:                                     {user_dir, PrivDir},
 1932:                                     {password, "bar"}])
 1933:             end),
 1934:             os:cmd(os:find_executable("tmux") ++ " new-window -n " ++ ClientName ++ " -d -- "++
 1935:                 "ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null localhost -p 8989 -l foo"),
 1936:             "" = tmux(["set-option -t ",ClientName," remain-on-exit on"]),
 1937: 
 1938:             timer:sleep(2000),
 1939:             check_content(Tmux,"Enter password for \"foo\""),
 1940:             "" = tmux("send -t " ++ ClientName ++ " bar Enter"),
 1941:             timer:sleep(1000),
 1942:             check_content(Tmux,"\\d+\n?>"),
 1943:             Tmux#tmux{ ssh_server_name = Name };
 1944:         true ->
 1945:             Tmux
 1946:     end.
 1947: 
 1948: get_top_parent_test_group(Config) ->
 1949:     maybe
 1950:         GroupPath = proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config),
 1951:         [_|_] ?= GroupPath,
 1952:         [{name, Group2}] ?= lists:last(GroupPath),
 1953:         Group2
 1954:     else
 1955:         _ -> proplists:get_value(name,
 1956:                                  proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,
 1957:                                                                 Config))
 1958:     end.
 1959: 
 1960: set_tty_prompt(Term, Config) ->
 1961:     PG = get_top_parent_test_group(Config),
 1962: 
 1963:     Prompt = fun() -> ["\e[94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e[0m"] end,
 1964:     Prompt1 = proplists:get_value(shell_prompt_func_test, Config, Prompt),
 1965: 
 1966:     if PG =:= ssh ->
 1967:             erpc:call(Term#tmux.node, application, set_env,
 1968:                 [stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test, Prompt1]);
 1969:         true ->
 1970:             erpc:call(Term#tmux.node, application, set_env,
 1971:                 [stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test, Prompt1])
 1972:     end.
 1973: 
 1974: %% Start a tty, setup custom prompt and set cursor at bottom
 1975: start_tty(Config) ->
 1976: 
 1977:     Term = setup_tty(Config),
 1978: 
 1979:     set_tty_prompt(Term, Config),
 1980:
